str2: A little child. Diminutive of teknon; an infant, i.e. darlings.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To love, wish well to, take pleasure in, long for; denotes the love of reason, esteem. Perhaps from agan; to love.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
And not, not even, neither?nor. From me and de; but not, not even; in a continued negation, nor.
The tongue; by implication, a language.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.
